body:
Really cool to see 3.7.1 compiled... wow, what service!


Actually I've been digging only semi-succesfully in the archives to find a
definition on the recently added mesh primitive, since I'd like to write a
custom exporting function to Radiance. Where could I find a description of
this primitive? Any experiences writing converters to mesh primitives are
appreciated, of course!


Cheers,


Jelle.
___
